name: Introduction to Musicology
description: This course introduces students to the discipline of musicology. It focuses on music history, music theory, and music appreciation.

name: Introduction to Music Technology
description: This course introduces students to the fundamentals of music technology. It covers topics such as audio production, recording techniques, and digital music composition.

name: Music Technology I
description: This course covers more advanced topics in music technology. It focuses on topics such as electronic music production, digital audio workstations, and sound synthesis.

name: Music Technology II
description: This course covers even more advanced topics in music technology. It focuses on topics such as music programming, music visualization, and interactive music systems.
